This is a dream, this is

Zermatt, Switzerland is home
to the mighty Matterhorn.
We had the opportunity to mountain bike
the 4 Lakes Bike Tour one day,
and then hike the 5 Lakes Trail, another.

This is what you can expect
when hiking or biking

the Matterhorn lakes starting
from Stellisee at sunrise.
(upbeat music)

We have arrived at lake
Stellisee for sunrise
over the Matterhorn.
This is incredible.
You take the 5:30 gondola up

and it's about a 30 minute
walk, maybe 20 minutes,
it's pretty fast.
And sunrise today was at 6:20.
They change the gondola every time,
depending on when sunrise is.

So we made it up in time
and it's spectacular.

I highly recommend it.

Both the 5 Lakes walk
and the 4 Lakes Bike Tour

in Zermatt begin at the
Sunnegga-Rothorn valley station.

You then take an underground
funicular up to Sunnegga,

where you transfer on to
a spectacular gondola ride
up to Blauherd mountain station
at 2,571 meters in elevation.

Okay, we have transferred
from the cogwheel train,
now we're getting onto the gondola

no uphill, awesome.
